article_title: Breaking: ESPN pretty sure Michael Sam takes showers, not sure with whom he’s showering
article_text:
Topics: michael sam, mystery showers, NFL, showering, Sports, Video, Life News, News, Politics News

Here’s what we know: Michael Sam is at Rams training camp, and he is definitely showering.

Here’s what we don’t know: When Michael Sam is showering, whether Michael Sam is riding his bike or doing other things during the times that he is not showering, and who is around Michael Sam when Michael Sam is showering.

More to come as this very important story develops.

h/t Cork Gaines
